subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Brooklyn crowd jeered Kidd, the Bucks’ new coach, who had an acrimonious split with the Nets over the summer. But an improving Milwaukee team pulled out a victory at Barclays Center.
snippet: The Brooklyn crowd jeered Kidd, the Bucks’ new coach, who had an acrimonious split with the Nets over the summer. But an improving Milwaukee team pulled out a victory at Barclays Center.
